cast.name: 丽塔·塔欣厄姆 Rita Tushingham
杰弗里·霍尔内 Geoffrey Horne

introduction: In an extended version of a programme first shown on BBC1 in April, Jonathan Ross explores the work of one of the great names in British and international cinema, double Oscar-winning director and master of the epic, David Lean. The likes of Steven Spielberg, Richard Attenborough and Alan Parker are among the cast list of admirers and colleagues who join Jonathan to analyse the career of the man behind Lawrence of Arabia, The Bridge on the River Kwai, Great Expectations and Brief Encounter.
